_comment: Sonus Bot Configuration - Edit the values below

_instructions.discord_token: Get from https://discord.com/developers/applications - Create app > Bot > Copy Token
_instructions.spotify_setup: Go to https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard - Create app > Settings > Copy Client ID & Secret
_instructions.spotify_redirect: In Spotify app settings, add redirect URI: http://localhost:8888/callback/spotify
